CustomObject.description: Represents item instances that are not generally tied to any specific customer and which can be tracked in inventory. Useful for equipment or devices before they are purchased by a customer or that are never purchased by a customer. Examples include inventoried SIM cards, networking equipment, set-top boxes and meters.
CustomObject.label: Inventory Item
